string.name: reactandroid_link_description
string.description: provides an interactive reference to a resource

string.name: reactandroid_image_description
string.description: images, code snippets, text, emojis, or other content that can be combined to deliver information in a visual manner

string.name: reactandroid_imagebutton_description
string.description: Displays a button with an image (instead of text) that can be pressed or clicked by the user

string.name: reactandroid_header_description
string.description: heading to a page or section

string.name: reactandroid_alert_description
string.description: important, and usually time-sensitive, information

string.name: reactandroid_combobox_description
string.description: input that controls another element that can pop up to help the user set the value of that input

string.name: reactandroid_menu_description
string.description: offers a list of choices to the user

string.name: reactandroid_menubar_description
string.description: presentation of menu that usually remains visible and is usually presented horizontally

string.name: reactandroid_menuitem_description
string.description: an option in a set of choices contained by a menu or menubar

string.name: reactandroid_progressbar_description
string.description: displays the progress status for tasks that take a long time

string.name: reactandroid_radiogroup_description
string.description: a group of radio buttons

string.name: reactandroid_scrollbar_description
string.description: controls the scrolling of content within a viewing area

string.name: reactandroid_spinbutton_description
string.description: defines a type of range that expects the user to select a value from among discrete choices

string.name: reactandroid_rn_tab_description
string.description: an interactive element inside a tablist

string.name: reactandroid_tablist_description
string.description: container for a set of tabs

string.name: reactandroid_timer_description
string.description: a numerical counter listing the amount of elapsed time from a starting point or the remaining time until an end point

string.name: reactandroid_toolbar_description
string.description: a collection of commonly used function buttons or controls represented in a compact visual form

string.name: reactandroid_summary_description
string.description: provides a summary of current conditions, settings, or state, such as the current temperature in the Weather app

string.name: reactandroid_state_busy_description
string.description: an element currently being updated or modified

string.name: reactandroid_state_expanded_description
string.description: a menu, dialog, accordian panel, or other widget which is expanded

string.name: reactandroid_state_collapsed_description
string.description: a menu, dialog, accordian panel, or other widget which is collapsed

string.name: reactandroid_state_unselected_description
string.description: used to indicate which elements within single-selection and multiple-selection composite widgets are not selected

string.name: reactandroid_state_on_description
string.description: a switch in its enabled state

string.name: reactandroid_state_off_description
string.description: a switch in its disabled state

string.name: reactandroid_state_mixed_description
string.description: a checkbox, radio button, or other widget which is both checked and unchecked
